title: Zhang Rui-Yang
text:
Email
  

      






    
    
  


I am currently in the first year of STOR-i CDT at Lancaster University. Previously, I did BSc Mathematics and Statistical Science at University College London where I was mentored by Sam Livingstone.
I am broadly interested in computational statistics, especially the methodological aspect of it.
I write texts from time to time. They are placed under notes.
Very interesting article by E Weinan: “The Dawning of a New Era in Applied Mathematics”.
